query: SELECT asset_type, asset_subtype, date_trunc_ym(data_as_of) AS month, COUNT(*) AS count WHERE data_as_of >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY asset_type, asset_subtype, month ORDER BY asset_type, asset_subtype, month

asset_type.description: Type of the asset maintained by Recreation and Parks Department.

asset_subtype.description: Subtype of the asset related to the main type.

month.description: Month of the data record, aggregated by month.

count.description: Count of assets grouped by type and subtype per month.

table_metadata.title: Linear Assets Maintained by the Recreation and Parks Department
table_metadata.description: Assets maintained by Rec and Park, represented as lines. These include gates, handrails, fences, etc.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: Parks and Recreation department, city planners, public safety officials
